destinations.name: Cairo
destinations.description: Egypt's capital, home to ancient pyramids, museums, and vibrant bazaars
destinations.longDescription: Cairo is Egypt's sprawling capital, set on the Nile River. At its heart is Tahrir Square and the vast Egyptian Museum, a trove of antiquities including royal mummies and gilded King Tutankhamun artifacts. Nearby, Giza is the site of the iconic pyramids and Great Sphinx, dating to the 26th century BC.
highlights: Great Pyramids of Giza and Sphinx
Egyptian Museum with King Tut treasures
thingsToDo: Visit the Pyramids of Giza and ride camels in the desert
Explore the Egyptian Museum's vast collection of antiquities
Shop for souvenirs at Khan El-Khalili market
Take a sunset felucca ride on the Nile River
Tour the Citadel of Cairo and Muhammad Ali Mosque
localCustoms: Dress modestly when visiting mosques and religious sites
Bargaining is expected in markets and bazaars
Friday is the main prayer day; some sites may have limited hours
Tipping (baksheesh) is customary for most services
destinations.visaRequirements: Most nationalities can obtain a visa on arrival at Cairo International Airport for $25 USD. E-visas are also available online. Passports must be valid for at least 6 months from entry date.
destinations.climate: Hot desert climate with very little rainfall. Summers (June-August) are extremely hot, while winters (December-February) are mild and pleasant.
weatherWarnings: Summer temperatures can exceed 40°C - stay hydrated and avoid midday sun
Sandstorms can occur in spring (Khamsin winds)
Winter nights can be surprisingly cold - bring a jacket
destinations.metaTitle: Cairo Travel Guide - Pyramids, Museums & Ancient Wonders
destinations.metaDescription: Discover Cairo, Egypt's vibrant capital. Visit the Pyramids, explore ancient museums, cruise the Nile, and experience rich history and culture.

categories.name: Pyramid Tours
categories.description: Guided tours to explore the ancient pyramids of Egypt
categories.longDescription: Experience the wonder of ancient Egypt with our comprehensive pyramid tours. Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and lesser-known pyramids at Saqqara and Dahshur. Learn about the fascinating history, construction techniques, and mysteries surrounding these 4,500-year-old monuments from expert Egyptologists.
highlights: Camel or horse rides around the pyramids
features: Small group sizes for personalized experience
Entry fees to all sites included
Traditional Egyptian lunch at local restaurants
categories.metaTitle: Pyramid Tours Egypt - Giza, Saqqara & Dahshur | Book Now
categories.metaDescription: Explore Egypt's magnificent pyramids with expert guides. Visit Giza, Saqqara, and Dahshur. Skip-the-line access, camel rides, and unforgettable experiences.

attractionPages.title: Best Attractions in Cairo
attractionPages.description: Discover Cairo's top attractions including the Pyramids, museums, and historical sites
attractionPages.longDescription: Cairo is home to some of the world's most iconic attractions. From the ancient Pyramids of Giza to world-class museums housing priceless artifacts, the city offers an unparalleled journey through 5,000 years of history. Explore our curated selection of must-visit attractions and book unforgettable experiences.
features: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before
